title: travelplanner: Could you create a 5-day travel itinerary starting from Pittsburgh and venturing into 2 cities in Texas from March 5th to March 9th, 2022, for a group of 7 people? Our budget is set at $16,100. It's important for us to stay in accommodations that permit children under the age of 10. (a43c3658d32d9109)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan with the `submit_day_plan` function for each day of the trip!

chat_history.content: Could you create a 5-day travel itinerary starting from Pittsburgh and venturing into 2 cities in Texas from March 5th to March 9th, 2022, for a group of 7 people? Our budget is set at $16,100. It's important for us to stay in accommodations that permit children under the age of 10.

['Abilene', 'Amarillo', 'Harlingen', 'Lubbock', 'College Station', 'Corpus Christi', 'Wichita Falls', 'Waco', 'San Angelo', 'Houston', 'San Antonio', 'Del Rio', 'Mission', 'Beaumont', 'Longview', 'Midland', 'El Paso', 'Brownsville', 'Austin', 'Dallas', 'Killeen', 'Laredo', 'Texarkana']

chat_history.content:
# **Day 1:**
## **Pittsburgh:**
- **10:00:** Breakfast at [Onyx Bar - Hotel The Royal Plaza](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Onyx+Bar+-+Hotel+The+Royal+Plaza/@40.4461188,-79.9556419,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m6!3m5!1s0x8834f2167771c7ed:0x765202348f883a24!8m2!3d40.4461188!4d-79.9556419?hl=en).
- **10:30:** Flight to Austin.
- **12:00:** Explore [Austin Nature & Science Center](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Austin+Nature+%26+Science+Center/@30.272172,-97.773319,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.272172!4d-97.773319?hl=en).
- **14:00:** Lunch at [Mehfil-e-Handi](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Mehfil-e-Handi/@30.2639247,-97.736804,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.2639247!4d-97.736804?hl=en).
- **15:00:** See the [Museum of the Weird](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Museum+of+the+Weird/@30.267167,-97.73867,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.267167!4d-97.73867?hl=en).
- **16:30:** Visit [Zilker Metropolitan Park](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Zilker+Metropolitan+Park/@30.266976,-97.77297,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.266976!4d-97.77297?hl=en).
- **18:30:** Dinner at [Tandoori Nights](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Tandoori+Nights/@30.2690114,-97.737156,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.2690114!4d-97.737156?hl=en).
- **20:30:** Enjoy a night at [1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+Bedroom+,+Beautiful+Spacious+Brownstone/@30.2661354,-97.7263978,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.2661354!4d-97.7263978?hl=en).

## **Day 2:**
- **10:00:** Breakfast at [1 Bedroom, Beautiful Spacious Brownstone](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+Bedroom+,+Beautiful+Spacious+Brownstone/@30.2661354,-97.7263978,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.2661354!4d-97.7263978?hl=en).
- **10:30:** Visit [Umlauf Sculpture Garden & Museum](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Umlauf+Sculpture+Garden+%26+Museum/@30.263258,-97.766156,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.263258!4d-97.766156?hl=en).
- **12:00:** Lunch at [The Kasbah](https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Kasbah/@30.2674711,-97.739538,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.2674711!4d-97.739538?hl=en).
- **13:00:** Explore [Texas Capitol](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Texas+Capitol/@30.274665,-97.740351,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.274665!4d-97.740351?hl=en).
- **15:00:** Take a trip to [Texas Selfie Museum](https://www.google.com/maps/search/Texas+Selfie+Museum/@30.266011,-97.738305,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.266011!4d-97.738305?hl=en).
- **17:00:** Visit [Haunted ATX](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Haunted+ATX/@30.264969,-97.734132,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m2!3d30.264969!4d-97.734132?hl=en).
- **19:00:** Dinner at [Moksha](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Moksha/@30.2707019,-97.736213,17z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x8644a60a7e24b255:0xdc757d28546883a3!8m

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
